name: Lightning Shield
text:
You must control a Thunder monster in order to activate this card, and in order to activate and resolve its effects. You can only control 1 "Lightning Shield." Each time a Spell Card is activated, increase a Thunder monster's ATK by 100. If you do, you can negate the effect(s) of that Spell, and if you do that, destroy this card. 

Concept by TheLoneCarrot/bloco100
